text: Letter dated 31 October 2018 from the President of the Security Council addressed to the Secretary-General

I have the honour to inform you that your letter dated 24 October 2018 (S/2018/955) concerning the expansion of the remit of the Special Envoy for Sudan and South Sudan to cover the Horn of Africa region has been brought to the attention of the members of the Security Council. They take note of the information contained in the letter.
